skill_e.tooltip:
Passive: Champions Jhin kills will create and detonate a Lotus Trap at their location.

Active: Jhin places an invisible Lotus Trap that creates a zone that Slows by ?% when stepped on by an enemy. After ? seconds, the trap detonates, dealing ? magic damage.

Traps last for ? minutes. This ability has 2 charges.

skill_i.tooltip: Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, is a precise instrument designed to deal superior damage. It fires at a fixed rate and carries only four shots. Jhin imbues the final bullet with dark magics to critically strike and deal bonus execute damage. Whenever Whisper crits, it inspires Jhin with a burst of movement speed.

skill_q.tooltip:
Jhin launches a cartridge that deals ? physical damage before bouncing to a nearby enemy that has not been hit yet.

The cartridge can hit a maximum of ? times. Enemies that die shortly after being hit increase the damage of subsequent hits by ?%.

skill_r.tooltip: Jhin sets up and channels, enabling him to fire 4 super shots, each dealing between ? and ? physical damage to the first champion hit based on their percentage missing health and Slowing them by ?% for ? seconds. The fourth shot critically strikes for ?% damage.

skill_w.tooltip:
Jhin fires a long range shot dealing ? physical damage to the first champion hit, and ? damage to other enemies along the way.

If this skill strikes a champion that has been damaged by an allied champion within the last ? seconds, it will Root them for ? second(s) and grant Jhin Whisper's Move Speed.
